SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT * FROM online_order AS oo WHERE 1=1 <%= AND oo.STATUS=@@Status@@ %> <R%= AND oo.order_no LIKE '%@@OrderNo@@%'%R> <R%= AND oo.pay_type IN (@@PickUp@@)%R> ORDER BY oo.created_date asc LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM online_order AS oo WHERE 1=1 <%= AND oo.STATUS=@@Status@@%> <R%= AND oo.order_no LIKE '%@@OrderNo@@%'%R> <R%= AND oo.pay_type IN (@@PickUp@@)%R>;
